quotes: Director, USI from Jul 1996 to Dec 2008
commissioned into the 20th Battalion of the MARATHA LIGHT INFANTRY on 15 Dec 1957
From Jul 1977 to Jan 1979, he served as a member of the Indian Army Training Team in Iraq
served as the Military Adviser at the High Commission of India in London from Dec 1983 to Nov 1987
responsible for establishing and commanding the mission from Mar 1992 to Mar 1993
superannuated as the Deputy Chief of the Army Staff on 31 Aug 1994
Government of India conferred upon him the Padma Bhushan on 26 January 2009
assumed charge as the Director of the United Service Institution of India on 01 July 1996
held the position until 31 Dec 2008
appointed Adviser to the Government of Sri Lanka on its peace process from 2002 to 2003
